metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000018 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4., and 4.6 are vulnerable to a DOS attack in thereplication status by using a specially crafted table name

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.6-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.6-5').
